jobs.title: Backdrop Photographer Base
jobs.description:
You will be taking pictures for on-site printing at the 2nd annual Stranger Things block party from 4-9pm. I will be on site to assist and print the photos.
(On set by 3:15. I will provide the backdrop and printer. You only need your equipment)

jobs.title: Backdrop Photographer Spotlight
jobs.description:
You will be taking pictures for on-site printing at the Douglasville O'Neal Plaza Halloween Block Party from 4-8pm. I will be on site to assist and print the photos.
(On set by 3:15. I will provide the backdrop and printer. You only need your equipment)
